entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI targeting Windows does not show/display #14309
  • MAUI iOS simulator build does not include in plist all build environment properties #14306
  • Grid star (Image?) behaviour inconsistent across platforms #14305
  • Obsolete FocusChangeRequested #14299
    Backlog
  • Label no longer wrapping / measuring correctly inside Grid when available size shrinks enough #14296
    Backlog
  • Inside Stacklayout ScrollView not working #4176 #14293
  • Buttons at end of layout (and Gesture Recognizers) do not trigger! ... Unless you HOT RELOAD the page #14292
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #14288
  • Path Quality losses in Windows platforn #14286
  • OnNavigatedTo and OnAppearing not being called #14284
    Backlog
  • The WindowSoftInputMode property on the Activity attribute is ignored #14281
    Backlog

Closed

  • IsPassword Property of Entry control does not work for the numeric keyboard when set dynamically. #12332
    Backlog
  • Input in Entry filed with Keyboard="Numeric" does not accept "," input #12424
    Backlog
  • Performance degradation when navigating to a page and going back several times #12930
    Backlog
  • MenuBarItems Doesn't Work Correctly in Multi-Windows on MacCatalyst #10702
    Backlog
  • Unable to compile solution on VS for MAC #14169
  • We need a TouchGestureRecognizer ASAP #14297
  • blazor winform publish #13539
  • Where is SpeechRecognizer? #14294
  • Demand Suggestions #14283
  • XAML Hot Reload is broken within Shell.TitleView #13992
    Backlog
  • When two control views overlap, setting the opacity and TranslationY properties is invalid #11658
    Backlog
  • Animated gifs never stop #7020
    Backlog
  • Maui Performance Issues #14227
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Trimming / AOT issue after publish in .NET MAUI Blazor app #14271
  • (Windows) RC1 - RefreshView does not appear when swiping down with mouse #6404
    Backlog
  • `Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.targets` breaks build on macOS #14279
  • unexpected platformView for grid layout #14144
  • IsEnabled is unable to update visual appearance #13971

PullRequests

Created

  • Add some conditions so we could skip if we wanted #14310
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] Update preview3 branch with latest fixes from net8 #14308
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #14307
  • [iOS] Make sure the update the frame of the RefreshView content #14302
  • [xamlc] fix `assembly=mscorlib` namespaces in `Release` mode #14301
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1 #14291
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0.2 to 1.8.0 #14290
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.9 to 1.3.0 #14289
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨
  • Add a new Sdk.props for the existing Sdk.targets #14300
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Allow to refresh the RefreshView using the mouse #14261
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.4 to 1.5.0 #14264
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [TEST] strong name net8 (test of #14080) #14245
    area/tooling ⚙️, do-not-merge
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Button` #14280
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
